feed.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw

entry.title: Some Day Peg: A crazy two-way peg bridging BTC to other chains Raw
entry.summary: In a post on a forum, Robin shared an interesting but not-so-serious attempt to implement a two-way peg in Bitcoin Script. He provided a link to the GitHub gist where the code is available. It is unclear what the purpose of the implementation is or if it will be used in any practical application. Nonetheless, it is an interesting development in the world of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology.
